meanings.definition: To dive underwater using a self-contained underwater breathing apparatus (scuba).
meanings.sent1: Yesterday, I scubaed in the clear blue ocean.
meanings.sent2: People often scubaed to explore the colorful coral reefs.
meanings.sent3: The fish were jealous of my scubaed adventures.
meanings.sent4: Her dreams were like scubaed journeys into the unknown.
meanings.sent5: The feeling of weightlessness while scubaed is unforgettable.

meanings.definition: The past tense of the verb 'scuba', meaning to have dived underwater using scuba gear.
meanings.sent1: After my scubaed, I felt exhilarated by the underwater world.
meanings.sent2: His scubaed was the highlight of his vacation.
meanings.sent3: The octopus laughed at the clumsy scubaed of the new diver.
meanings.sent4: Her memories were a collection of scubaed snapshots.
meanings.sent5: The achievement of his scubaed was celebrated by his friends.
